problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC的内部有一点P,且D,E,F是P分别以AB,BC,AC为对称轴的对称点．若△ABC的内角∠A=70°,∠B=60°,∠C=50°,则∠ADB+∠BEC+∠CFA=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there is a point P inside △ABC, and D, E, F are the symmetry points of P with AB, BC, and AC as the symmetry axis respectively. If the inner angle of △ABC ∠A = N_0, ∠B = N_1, ∠C = N_2, then ∠ADB + ∠BEC + ∠CFA = ()
raw_answer: 解:连接AP,BP,CP,∵D,E,F是P分别以AB,BC,AC为对称轴的对称点∴∠ADB=∠APB,∠BEC=∠BPC,∠CFA=∠APC,∴∠ADB+∠BEC+∠CFA=∠APB+∠BPC+∠APC=360°．故选:C．
